arabic_text: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
translation: Nibateshwe bate, barahumba! Ahubwo ni amajambo y’Imana Allah Yahishuriye Intumwa yayo. Bananiwe kwemera Qor’ani, kuko imitima yabo yaguye ingese, itewe n’ibicumuro bakoze.

arabic_text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ
translation: Nibateshwe bate, barahumba! Ahubwo mu vy’ukuri, abahakanyi kuri uwo musi w’izuka, bazobuzwa kubona Imana yabo Rurema Allah[1];
footnotes: [1] Iyi Aayah, irerekana ko abemeramana ari bo bazobona Imana yabo Rurema Allah mu Bwami bw’ijuru.

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمۡ لَصَالُواْ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
translation: Hanyuma binjire mu muriro ururumba, bawote;

arabic_text: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
translation: Hanyuma babwirwe n’abamalayika bawucungereye bati: “Ibi, ni vya bihano mwahora muhakana mwivuye inyuma”.

arabic_text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
translation: Emwe! Nibateshwe bate barahumba! Mu vy’ukuri, ivyanditswe ku beranda biri ku rwego ruhanitse “Illiyyiina” mu Bwami bw’ijuru.

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
translation: Mbega, ni igiki cokumenyesha urwego ruhanitse “Illiyyiina” ico ari co!

arabic_text: كِتَٰبٞ مَّرۡقُومٞ
translation: Ni ivyagenewe aberanda, vyanditswe mu buryo ata kwihenda kurimwo;

arabic_text: يَشۡهَدُهُ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ
translation: Bibonwa n’abamalayika b’abishikira.

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri aberanda, bazoba bari mu nema z’Ubwami bw’ijuru;

arabic_text: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
translation: Bicaye ku bitanda bisharije vy'iteka biteye igomwe, baraba Imana yabo Allah hamwe n’ingabirano n’ivyiza bahawe;

arabic_text: تَعۡرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمۡ نَضۡرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
translation: Uzobona basayangana mu maso kubera akamwemwe ku kandi gatewe n’inema z’Imana Allah;

arabic_text: يُسۡقَوۡنَ مِن رَّحِيقٖ مَّخۡتُومٍ
translation: Bazoherezwa inzoga zitaboreza, zipfundikiye neza zitwararitswe.

arabic_text: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكٞۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ
translation: Uwuhejeje kunywa kuri nya nzoga, mu kanwa hasigara akamoto ka “Miski”. Mu gutsindira izo nema rero, nibarushanwe abarushanwa.

arabic_text: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسۡنِيمٍ
translation: Iyo nzoga yengeshejwe amazi ya “Tasniim”;

arabic_text: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ
translation: Ni iriba, abatoni b’Imana Allah bazonywako.

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri abahakanye Imana Allah, bahora batwenga abemeramana bakiri kw’isi;

arabic_text: وَإِذَا مَرُّواْ بِهِمۡ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
translation: Mu gihe babarenganye, bavunanira urugohe ku gasuzuguro;

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُواْ فَكِهِينَ
translation: Mu gihe naho batashe mu miryango yabo, bagataha baryohewe batera inkuru z’ukuntu basuzuguye abemeramana;

arabic_text: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
translation: Iyo naho babonye ingendanyi zamaze kwemera Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), bavuga bati: “Mu vy’ukuri, abo ni bo bahuvye, bari mu muzimiza”.

arabic_text: وَمَآ أُرۡسِلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ
translation: Kanatsinda, ntibatumwe kugira ngo bazicungere.

arabic_text: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ
translation: Uno musi w’izuka rero, abemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bakubahiriza n’amabwirizwa yayo, baratwenga abagararije basuzuguritse mu bihano;

arabic_text: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
translation: Abemeramana bazoba bicaye ku bitanda vy'iteka bisharije biteye igomwe, baraba Imana yabo Allah hamwe n’ingabirano n’ivyiza bahawe;

arabic_text: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ
translation: Bazovuga bati: “Mbega yemwe! Abagarariji boba bahembewe ivyo bari barakoze kw’isi?”.

arabic_text: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتۡ
translation: Igihe ijuru ryasadutse rigatabuka ku musi w’umuhero w’isi;

arabic_text: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ
translation: Rikumvira Imana yaryo Rurema Allah, kandi ritegerezwa nta kibuza;

arabic_text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مُدَّتۡ
translation: Igihe n’isi yasanjwe;

arabic_text: وَأَلۡقَتۡ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتۡ
translation: Igasohora abantu n’ubutare biri muri yo, igasigara igaragara;

arabic_text: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ
translation: Ikumvira Imana yayo Rurema Allah, kandi itegerezwa nta kibuza.

arabic_text: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ
translation: Ewe muntu! Mu vy’ukuri wewe, ugana ku Mana Allah, ukita ku rutare mu bikorwa, vyaba vyiza canke bibi, kugeza aho uzohura n’Imana yawe Rurema Allah Ikabiguhembera.

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ
translation: Uwo wese rero azohabwa igitabu c’ibikorwa vyiwe mu kuboko kwiwe kw’iburyo;

arabic_text: فَسَوۡفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابٗا يَسِيرٗا
translation: Uyo, ni we azoharurirwa ibiharuro vyoroshe;

arabic_text: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورٗا
translation: Maze agasubira mu bantu biwe mu Bwami bw’ijuru akanyamuneza kamusya.

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ
translation: Nayo uwuzohabwa igitabu c’ibikorwa vyiwe inyuma y’umugongo wiwe;

arabic_text: فَسَوۡفَ يَدۡعُواْ ثُبُورٗا
translation: Uyo rero, azoheza yisabire urupfu;

arabic_text: وَيَصۡلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
translation: Yinjire no mu muriro wama wegenyejwe;

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِيٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورًا
translation: Kuko mu vy’ukuri, yahorana akanyamuneza mu muryango wiwe akiri kw’isi, nta co yategekanirije uyu musi.

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri, yibaza ko atazosubira ku Mana yiwe Allah ngo Imuharurire.

arabic_text: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا
translation: Yobuzwa n’iki gusubira ku Mana Allah! Mu vy’ukuri Imana yiwe Rurema Allah, Yamye ari Nyenukubona, Yaramubona we n’ivyo yakora.

arabic_text: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ
translation: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku bicu bitukura bugorovye!

arabic_text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
translation: No kw’ijoro n’ivyo rinyegeje!

arabic_text: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ
translation: No ku kwezi iyo gukwijije umuco mu mfato!

arabic_text: لَتَرۡكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٖ
translation: Bantu! Ni ukuri muzohura n’ibihe bigoye bisumbasumbana[726].
footnotes: [726] Umuntu wese aremwa mw’ima ry’intanga, rigahinduka amaraso avuze; nya maraso avuze agahinduka igihimba c’inyama; hanyuma nya gihimba c’inyama kigahuhirwamwo inkomoko y’ubuzima “Roho”. Yamara kuvuka akabaho, hanyuma agapfa, akazozuka, agashorerwa kw’iyegeranirizo ry’ibiremwa, hanyuma agaharurirwa.

arabic_text: فَمَا لَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
translation: Mbega, abantu babuzwa n’iki kwemera Imana Allah n’umusi w’iherezo, kandi basomerwa Aayah za Qor’ani zitomoye!

arabic_text: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩
translation: N’iyo basomewe Qor’ani, ntibubamira Imana Allah ngo bemere amabwirizwa yayo.

arabic_text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يُكَذِّبُونَ
translation: Ahubwo abagararije bahakana Qor’ani bivuye inyuma, izuka n’iharurirwa ry’ibiremwa.

arabic_text: وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
translation: Burya Imana Allah, ni Yo Izi neza ivyo bahishije mu mishaha yabo.

arabic_text: فَبَشِّرۡهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Bashikirize rero inkuru y'incamugongo yo guhabwa ibihano bibabaza.

arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ
translation: Ariko abantu bemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bakanakora n'ivyiza bitegetswe, barafise impembo idahera bagenewe mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.

arabic_text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡبُرُوجِ
translation: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kw’ijuru rifise inzira-ntasobwa z’izuba n’ukwezi!

arabic_text: وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡمَوۡعُودِ
translation: No ku musi w’isango ryategekanijwe ry’izuka ry’ibiremwa!

arabic_text: وَشَاهِدٖ وَمَشۡهُودٖ
translation: No ku cabona cagiriza no ku wagirizwa[1]!
footnotes: [1] Imana Allah, Irahira ku co Ishatse mu biremwa, nayo ikiremwa ntikirekuriwe kurahira kiretse kw’izina ry’Imana Allah, kurahira ku kitari Imana Allah, ni ibangikanyamana.

arabic_text: قُتِلَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأُخۡدُودِ
translation: Harahonejwe abantu Benibinogo amahanga bimbiye abemeramana;

arabic_text: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡوَقُودِ
translation: Baraheza bavyatsamwo umuriro wenyegejwe;

arabic_text: إِذۡ هُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا قُعُودٞ
translation: Igihe bari bicaye hambavu yavyo;

arabic_text: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ
translation: Bitegereza ivyo bakorera abemeramana mu bihano.

arabic_text: وَمَا نَقَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ
translation: Nta na kimwe babahoye atari uko bemera Imana Imwe Rudende Allah, Nyenintsinzi-Mutaneshwa, Nyenugushimwa, Ishimwa ku mazina, amatazirano n’ibikorwa vyayo mu bihe vyose.

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ
translation: Ni Yo Nyenubwami, Igaba Ikaganza amajuru n’isi n’ibiri muri vyo vyose. Burya Imana Allah, Irazi ikintu ico ari co cose.

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُواْ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَتُوبُواْ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri, abatoteje abemeramana n’abemeramanakazi mu kubaturira kugira bavavanure n’idini ry’Imana Allah, hanyuma ntibigaya ku Mana Allah ngo basabe imbabazi, abo bazohanwa mu muriro wa Jahannamu, baranategekanirijwe ibihano vyo guturirwa.

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri, abemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bakanakora n'ivyiza bitegetswe, barategekanirijwe imirima itotahaye mu Bwami bw’ijuru, musi y’ibiti n’inyubakwa vyabwo hatemba inzuzi. Iyo, ni yo ntsinzi ihambaye.

arabic_text: إِنَّ بَطۡشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri, uguhana kw’Imana yawe Rurema Allah kurahambaye.

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبۡدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri, ni Yo Yatanguje kurema ibiremwa vyose ata co Irinze gufatirako, kandi ni Yo Izobisubiza ubuzima, biheze bizuke.

arabic_text: وَهُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلۡوَدُودُ
translation: Ni na Yo Nyenimbabazi-ntangere ku bigaya, Nyenurukundo-ntangere ku batoni bayo.

arabic_text: ذُو ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡمَجِيدُ
translation: Nyenubuhangamo, Nyeniteka.

arabic_text: فَعَّالٞ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
translation: Ikorana ubwira ico Ishatse, ntakiyinanira.

arabic_text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلۡجُنُودِ
translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Mbega, woba warashikiriwe n’inkuru y’ivyashikiye ingabo z’abagarariji!

arabic_text: فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَثَمُودَ
translation: Ingabo za Firawuni n’iza Bene Thamuudi!

arabic_text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي تَكۡذِيبٖ
translation: Ahubwo abagararije Imana Allah bishinga kubandanya bahakana nk’ab’aho hambere.

arabic_text: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطُۢ
translation: Burya Imana Allah na Yo ku bushobozi n’ubumenyi vyayo, Irabakikuje ku mpande zose, nta buhungiro.

arabic_text: بَلۡ هُوَ قُرۡءَانٞ مَّجِيدٞ
translation: Iyo Qor’ani bahakana, si amajambo y’abantu! Ahubwo, ni Qor’ani ntagatifu;

arabic_text: فِي لَوۡحٖ مَّحۡفُوظِۭ
translation: Yanditswe ku kibaho kibungabunzwe neza “Lawhu Mahfuudhw”.

arabic_text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ
translation: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kw’ijuru no ku giserukajoro!

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ
translation: Ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co igiserukajoro?

arabic_text: ٱلنَّجۡمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ
translation: Ni inyenyeri yakaka.

arabic_text: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ
translation: Ndarahiye kuri ivyo vyose, ko ata muntu n’umwe kiretse ko afise umubungabunzi azigama ibikorwa vyiwe mu bamalayika, kugira azobihemberwe!

arabic_text: فَلۡيَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
translation: Umuntu ahakana izuka ry’ibiremwa rero, niyitegereze ico yaremwemwo, aheze amenye ko izurwa ryiwe ritagoye nk’iremwa ryiwe!

arabic_text: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٖ دَافِقٖ
translation: Yaremwe mu mazi y’intanga asunitswe mu gitereko;

arabic_text: يَخۡرُجُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ ٱلصُّلۡبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ
translation: Avuye hagati y’uruti rw’umugongo w’umugabo n’igikiriza c’umugore.

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجۡعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٞ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah Yaremye umuntu mu mazi y’intanga, Irashoboye no kumugarura inyuma yo gupfa Ikamusubiza ubuzima, akazuka.

arabic_text: يَوۡمَ تُبۡلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ
translation: Umusi amabanga azoshirwa ahabona, ivyiza bikamenyekana n’ibibi bikagaragara;

arabic_text: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٖ وَلَا نَاصِرٖ
translation: Umuntu nta bubasha azoba afise bwo kwikingira ibihano, eka nta n’umutabazi amukura mu bihano azoronka.

arabic_text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجۡعِ
translation: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kw’ijuru ryenimvura yisubiriza iyo amazi kw’isi ayaze agasubira mu kirere!

arabic_text: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدۡعِ
translation: No kw’isi yiyata imigaga iyo ibiterwa bigondoye!

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلٞ فَصۡلٞ
translation: Ko mu vy’ukuri, iyo Qor’ani ari amajambo atandukanya ukuri n’ikinyoma;

arabic_text: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلۡهَزۡلِ
translation: Si n’iyo kujajura.

arabic_text: إِنَّهُمۡ يَكِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗا
translation: Mu vy’ukuri, abahakana Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah) hamwe na Qor’ani, bakoresha urwenge mu kurwanya ukuri.

arabic_text: وَأَكِيدُ كَيۡدٗا
translation: Nanje Allah Nkabahinyura mu kugaragaza ukuri gushika aho gutsinda.

arabic_text: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَمۡهِلۡهُمۡ رُوَيۡدَۢا
translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Kubera ivyo rero, tenyenyera abagarariji, ntiwihutire kubasabira ibihano, bihorere ubarindire gato, bazokwibonerako bidatevye.

arabic_text: سَبِّحِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡأَعۡلَى
translation: Ninahaza izina ry’Imana yawe Rurema Allah, Nyenicubahiro-ntangere (uvuge uti: “Sub-haana Rabbiya l-A’laa”).

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
translation: Yararemye ibiremwa, maze Iraringaniza indemo yavyo n’ibihimba; kimwe cose aho kigenewe, kibereye;

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
translation: Iraheza Irategekanya ivya nkenerwa vyose ku biremwa, Iranigisha kimwe cose ukuntu kivyikorako;

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ ٱلۡمَرۡعَىٰ
translation: Iranagisha n’uburagiro (ubwatsi);

arabic_text: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحۡوَىٰ
translation: Hanyuma Irabukavya, busa n’urwatsi rutoto ruja kwirabura.

arabic_text: سَنُقۡرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ
translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Twebwe Allah, Tuzokwigisha Qor’ani, ntuzoyibagira namba;

arabic_text: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ
translation: Kiretse ico Imana Allah Ishatse ko wibagira ku neza y’ibiremwa. Mu vy’ukuri, ni Yo Izi ibigaragara mu bikorwa no mu majambo n’ibinyegeje muri vyo.

arabic_text: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلۡيُسۡرَىٰ
translation: Tuzokworohereza gukora ivyoroshe; nko kwihanganira ishikirizabutumwa no kworoherezwa amabwirizwa y’idini.

arabic_text: فَذَكِّرۡ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
translation: Kubera ivyo rero, ibutsa abantu bawe warungitsweko gutumbera inzira igororotse, na canecane kwibutsa uwitezwe ko yibuka, nya kwibuka kukamugirira akamaro;

arabic_text: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخۡشَىٰ
translation: Hazokwibuka uwutinya ibihano vy'Imana Allah.

arabic_text: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى
translation: Uwaseserejwe n’ivyaha na we, azoheza yigire kure y’urwo rwibutso;

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِي يَصۡلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ
translation: Ari na we azokwinjira mu muriro udahera ukaze bihambaye;

arabic_text: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ
translation: Hanyuma ntazopfa muri wo ngo awuruhuke, eka ntazonawugiriramwo ubuzima buhimbaye.

arabic_text: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri yaramaze gutsinda, umuntu yiyejeje amabi;

arabic_text: وَذَكَرَ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ
translation: Akaninahaza n’izina ry’Imana yiwe Rurema Allah, maze agasenga amasengesho-bwirizwa ku mwanya, arondera gushimwa na Yo.

arabic_text: بَلۡ تُؤۡثِرُونَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا
translation: Bantu! Ahubwo rero, mushira imbere kurusha ubuzima bw’ibihendamaso vyo kw’isi;

arabic_text: وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ
translation: Kandi ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa, ari bwo bwiza gusumba, kandi bwamaho.

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِي ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri, ivyo vyose mwadondaguriwe muri iki gisomwa, biri no mu Bitabu vy’aho hambere ya Qor’ani;

arabic_text: صُحُفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
translation: Mu Mizingo y’Intumwa z’Imana Ibrahimu na Musa (za nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah).

arabic_text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلۡغَٰشِيَةِ
translation: Mbega Ntumwa y’Imana! Warashikiriwe n’inkuru y’umusi uhwikira ibiremwa!

arabic_text: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَٰشِعَةٌ
translation: Uwo musi, abagarariji bazosuzugurika bijirirwe mu maso kubera ibihano;

arabic_text: عَامِلَةٞ نَّاصِبَةٞ
translation: Bakore bita ku rutare, baruhe;

arabic_text: تَصۡلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةٗ
translation: Bazokwinjira mu muriro udahera, unyengetera cane;

arabic_text: تُسۡقَىٰ مِنۡ عَيۡنٍ ءَانِيَةٖ
translation: Banyweshwe mw’iriba ry’amazi asebura akaryimara;

arabic_text: لَّيۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٖ
translation: Nta mfungurwa bazohabwa atari amahwa yumye;

arabic_text: لَّا يُسۡمِنُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِن جُوعٖ
translation: Ntavyibusha namba eka ntanavuna n’inzara (ntanahembura) na gato.

arabic_text: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ نَّاعِمَةٞ
translation: Uwo musi rero, abemeramana bazorangwa n’akamwemwe mu maso;

arabic_text: لِّسَعۡيِهَا رَاضِيَةٞ
translation: Bashime mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa ibikorwa vyabo bakoze kw’isi;

arabic_text: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٖ
translation: Bazoba bari mu Bwami bw’ijuru bw’iteka;

arabic_text: لَّا تَسۡمَعُ فِيهَا لَٰغِيَةٗ
translation: Ntibazokwumvamwo insaku n’amajambo ata co amaze;

arabic_text: فِيهَا عَيۡنٞ جَارِيَةٞ
translation: Harimwo iriba ry’amazi atemba;

arabic_text: فِيهَا سُرُرٞ مَّرۡفُوعَةٞ
translation: Harimwo n’ibitanda vy’icubahiro bihanitse;

arabic_text: وَأَكۡوَابٞ مَّوۡضُوعَةٞ
translation: N’ibirahuri bishinguwe neza, vyabategekanirijwe;

arabic_text: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصۡفُوفَةٞ
translation: N’imisego itondeshejwe neza;

arabic_text: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبۡثُوثَةٌ
translation: N’ibisaswa vy’iteka bishashwe neza.

arabic_text: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ
translation: Mbega yemwe, abagarariji ntibitegereza ingamiya ingene yaremwe!

arabic_text: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيۡفَ رُفِعَتۡ
translation: N’ijuru ingene ryahanitswe, ata nkingi!

arabic_text: وَإِلَى ٱلۡجِبَالِ كَيۡفَ نُصِبَتۡ
translation: N’imisozi ingene yashimitswe!

arabic_text: وَإِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَيۡفَ سُطِحَتۡ
translation: N’isi ingene yashashwe, yagutse!

arabic_text: فَذَكِّرۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٞ
translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Kubera ivyo rero, Ibutsa abirengagiza ukuri, ko mu vy’ukuri wewe ujejwe kwibutsa gusa;

arabic_text: لَّسۡتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِمُصَيۡطِرٍ
translation: Wewe ntushinzwe kubahatira kwemera.

arabic_text: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
translation: Ariko uwugenza umugongo, agatsimbatara mu kugarariza;

arabic_text: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرَ
translation: Uyo, Imana Allah Izomuha ibihano ruhasha mu muriro.

arabic_text: إِنَّ إِلَيۡنَآ إِيَابَهُمۡ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri, igaruka ryabo - nibazuka - ni iwacu Twebwe Allah;

arabic_text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا حِسَابَهُم
translation: Hanyuma, nta nkeka ko ari Twebwe Allah, Tujejwe kubaharurira ku musi w’impera.

arabic_text: وَٱلۡفَجۡرِ
translation: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku mutwenzi!

arabic_text: وَلَيَالٍ عَشۡرٖ
translation: No ku majoro cumi ya mbere yo mu kwezi kwa 12, Dhul-Hijja!

arabic_text: وَٱلشَّفۡعِ وَٱلۡوَتۡرِ
translation: No kuri bibiribibiri na nyahagwe!

arabic_text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَسۡرِ
translation: No kw’ijoro iyo rihise! Ko abahakanyi bazohanwa;

arabic_text: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٞ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ
translation: Ubwo muri ivyo, ntiharimwo indahiro ikwiye ku wufise ubwenge!

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Mbega, ntiwabonye ingene Imana yawe Rurema Allah Yagize Bene Aadi igihe c’Intumwa Huudi (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah)!

arabic_text: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلۡعِمَادِ
translation: Ubwoko bwa Iramu, beninguvu n’amazu maremare;

arabic_text: ٱلَّتِي لَمۡ يُخۡلَقۡ مِثۡلُهَا فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ
translation: Nta baremwe nkabo mu bindi bisagara mu ngimba n’inguvu bari bafise.

arabic_text: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُواْ ٱلصَّخۡرَ بِٱلۡوَادِ
translation: Ntiwabonye n’ukuntu Yagize Bene Thamuudi, babaza amazu mu mabuye mu kabande igihe c’Intumwa Swalehe (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah)!

arabic_text: وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ ذِي ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ
translation: Ntiwabonye kandi ukuntu Yagize Firawuni nyeningabo zatsimbataje ubwami bwiwe muri Misiri!

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ
translation: Abo bose, barimonogoje mu bugizi bwa nabi, mu bihugu vy’Imana Allah;

arabic_text: فَأَكۡثَرُواْ فِيهَا ٱلۡفَسَادَ
translation: Baraheza bakwiragizamwo ubwononyi bwinshi;

arabic_text: فَصَبَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّكَ سَوۡطَ عَذَابٍ
translation: Maze Imana yawe Rurema Allah, Ica Irabamanurira ibihano bibakwiye.

arabic_text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلۡمِرۡصَادِ
translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Mu vy’ukuri Imana yawe Rurema Allah, ni Umureretsi w’ivyo bakoze, Iratenyenya ntiyibagira.

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكۡرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَكۡرَمَنِ
translation: Nayo umuntu, iyo Imana yiwe Rurema Allah Imugerageje, Ikamutera iteka ry’ubutegetsi canke ry’ubutunzi, araheza akibaza ko biturutse ku butore bwiwe, agaca avuga ati: “Imana yanje Rurema Allah, Yaranteye iteka nta ngere”.

arabic_text: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيۡهِ رِزۡقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَهَٰنَنِ
translation: Iyo naho Imugerageje, Ikamugerera mu vyo Imuronsa bimubeshaho, araheza akibaza ko biturutse ku gasuzuguro, agaca avuga ati: “Imana yanje Rurema Allah, Yaransuzuguye”.

arabic_text: كَلَّاۖ بَل لَّا تُكۡرِمُونَ ٱلۡيَتِيمَ
translation: Nateshwe ate, arahumba! Ariko guhabwa iteka guturuka ku kwumvira Imana Allah; gusuzugurwa na kwo, kugaturuka ku kugabitaniriza Imana Allah. Ahubwo rero mwebwe, ntimwitaho impfuvyi ngo muzifashe;

arabic_text: وَلَا تَحَٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينِ
translation: Ntimunahimirizanya gufungurira abakene;

arabic_text: وَتَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكۡلٗا لَّمّٗا
translation: Mukarya mukuzako n’amatungo y’abandi mu bisigi;

arabic_text: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡمَالَ حُبّٗا جَمّٗا
translation: Mugakunda n’amatungo urukundo rurenze.

arabic_text: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا
translation: Nimuteshwe mute, murahumba! Ntimwategerezwa kuba ukwo. Igihe rero isi yahondwahonzwe;

arabic_text: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلۡمَلَكُ صَفّٗا صَفّٗا
translation: Imana yawe Rurema Allah na Yo, Ikaza gutunganiriza ibiremwa, abamalayika na bo batonze ku murongo;

arabic_text: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
translation: Umuriro wa Jahannamu na wo kuri uwo musi, ugashirwa ahabona; uwo musi, umuntu w’umugarariji azokwikebuka yibuke kwigaya, ariko rero ukwo kwibuka akigaya, nta co kuzomumarira.

arabic_text: يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي قَدَّمۡتُ لِحَيَاتِي
translation: Azovuga yicuza ati: “Ubona iyo nkora nkiri kw’isi ivyomfasha muri ubu buzima bwanje bw’inyuma yo gupfa!”.

arabic_text: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٞ
translation: Kuri uwo musi rero, nta wuzohana umuhakanyi bikwiye nk’igihano c’Imana Allah.

arabic_text: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٞ
translation: Kandi nta wuzoboha nk’Imana Allah mu kudadira umuhakanyi.

arabic_text: يَٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفۡسُ ٱلۡمُطۡمَئِنَّةُ
translation: Iyo umwemeramana apfuye, abwirwa ati: “Ewe mutima utekanishijwe n’ininahaza n’itaziramana hamwe n’ukwemera Imana Allah!

arabic_text: ٱرۡجِعِيٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةٗ مَّرۡضِيَّةٗ
translation: Subira ku Mana yawe Rurema Allah wishimiye impera yayo, wishimiwe n’Iyakuremye Allah;

arabic_text: فَٱدۡخُلِي فِي عِبَٰدِي
translation: Uheze winjire rero mu mugwi w’abaja banje beranda;

arabic_text: وَٱدۡخُلِي جَنَّتِي
translation: Winjire no mu Bwami bwanje bw’ijuru”.

arabic_text: لَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ
translation: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kuri iki gisagara ceranda ca Makka!

arabic_text: وَأَنتَ حِلُّۢ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ
translation: Kikaba ari na co wewe Intumwa Muhamadi urekuriwe gukoreramwo ico ushatse[1].
footnotes: [1] Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), yarekuriwe gukorera mu gisagara ca Makka ico ishatse, harimwo n’indwano mu kiringo kitarenga isaha imwe ku mutaga. Iyi Aayah, irerekana ko Intumwa (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), izokwigarurira ico gisagara habanje kuba indwano.

arabic_text: وَوَالِدٖ وَمَا وَلَدَ
translation: Ndarahiye kandi no ku kiremwa kivyara (ari co Adamu) n’ikivyarwa (mu rwaruka rwiwe)!

arabic_text: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِي كَبَدٍ
translation: Ko mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah Twaremye, ikiremwa-muntu kizohura n’umuruho ku wundi kw’isi kugeza gupfa.

arabic_text: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ أَحَدٞ
translation: Mbega umuntu kubera amatungo yegeranije, yibaza ko ata wuzoshobora kumugonda!

arabic_text: يَقُولُ أَهۡلَكۡتُ مَالٗا لُّبَدًا
translation: Avuga yihaya ngo: “Naratanze amatungo menshi cane!”.

arabic_text: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّمۡ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
translation: Mbega, yibaza ko ata n’umwe amubona akazomuhera ku vyo yakoze, vyaba bike canke vyinshi!

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عَيۡنَيۡنِ
translation: Mbega, Twebwe Allah Ntitwamuhaye amaso abiri abonesha!

arabic_text: وَلِسَانٗا وَشَفَتَيۡنِ
translation: Tumuha n’ururimi hamwe n’iminwa ibiri, kugira ashobore gutomora ijambo!

arabic_text: وَهَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلنَّجۡدَيۡنِ
translation: Dutako Turamumenyesha Tumutomorera inzira zibiri, iy’iciza n’iy’ikibi, kugira ngo yihitiremwo!

arabic_text: فَلَا ٱقۡتَحَمَ ٱلۡعَقَبَةَ
translation: Mbega, ubwo ntiyotanga amatungo yiwe akabona kuruhuka umuruho wo mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa!

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡعَقَبَةُ
translation: Ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co umuruho wo mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa n’icowugukiza!

arabic_text: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
translation: Ni uguha umugurano w’umwemeramana ubwigenge;

arabic_text: أَوۡ إِطۡعَٰمٞ فِي يَوۡمٖ ذِي مَسۡغَبَةٖ
translation: Canke ugufungurira mu gihe c’inzara izura inzara;

arabic_text: يَتِيمٗا ذَا مَقۡرَبَةٍ
translation: Impfuvyi ya hafi mu muryango[2];
footnotes: [2] Ugaheza ukaronka indishi zo gutanga imperezwa n’izo kwunga ubuvandimwe.

arabic_text: أَوۡ مِسۡكِينٗا ذَا مَتۡرَبَةٖ
translation: Canke umworo ata co yimariye (ata gira shinge na rugero).

arabic_text: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡمَرۡحَمَةِ
translation: Inyuma yo gukora ivyo vyose, umuntu akaba ari mu bemeramana, bahanurana kwihanganira kwumvira Imana Allah no kutayigabitanyiriza, bakanahanurana kugirira impuhwe ibiremwa.

arabic_text: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَيۡمَنَةِ
translation: Abo barangwa n’ivyo rero, ni bo bantu bo mu ruhande rw’iburyo, bazoruhukira mu Bwami bw’ijuru.

arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ
translation: Nayo abagararije Aayah zacu za Qor’ani, abo ni bo bantu bo mu ruhande rw’ibubamfu;

arabic_text: عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَارٞ مُّؤۡصَدَةُۢ
translation: Bazoba bapfundikiriwe mu muriro ubakikuje ku mpande zose.

arabic_text: وَٱلشَّمۡسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا
translation: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku zuba no ku muco waryo mu gitondo!

arabic_text: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا
translation: No ku kwezi iyo gukurikiye izuba rirenze n’iyo riserutse!

arabic_text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا
translation: No ku murango iyo hakeye, umwijima w’ijoro ugaherengetera!

arabic_text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَغۡشَىٰهَا
translation: No kw’ijoro iyo ripfutse isi hakijima!

arabic_text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا
translation: No kw’ijuru n’ukuntu ryubatse!

arabic_text: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا
translation: No kw’isi n’ukuntu ishashe, kugira ibiremwa bishobore kuyibako!

arabic_text: وَنَفۡسٖ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا
translation: No ku mushaha w’ikiremwa ico ari co cose n’ukuntu watunganijwe n’Imana Allah!

arabic_text: فَأَلۡهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقۡوَىٰهَا
translation: Igaheza Ikawumenyesha mu kuwutomorera inzira y’inabi n’iy’ineza!

arabic_text: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا
translation: Ni ukuri yaratsinze, uwejeje umushaha agakora ivyiza.

arabic_text: وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا
translation: Kandi ni ukuri yarahomvye ubuzima bwiwe, uwasibije umushaha agakora ivyaha.

arabic_text: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ بِطَغۡوَىٰهَآ
translation: Bene Thamuudi barahakanye Intumwa y’Imana Swalehe (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah), kubera ukwimonogoza kwabo mu gukora ivyaha;

arabic_text: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشۡقَىٰهَا
translation: Igihe hiyadukiza inkozi y’ikibi muri bo[1] kugira ice imitsi ingamiya;
footnotes: [1] Yitwa Kubaru mwene Salifu.

arabic_text: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا
translation: Intumwa y’Imana Swalehe (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah), iraheza ibabwira iti: “Mwoye gukomakoma ingamiya yarungitswe n’Imana Allah, mwiyubare kuyivogera ku musi wayo yagenewe gushoka kunywa”.

arabic_text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
translation: Maze barayigarariza batako baraca imitsi ya nya ngamiya. Imana yabo Rurema Allah Ica Irabahana, Irabahonya bose ata n’umwe arokotse, kubera ibicumuro vyabo.

arabic_text: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقۡبَٰهَا
translation: Kandi Imana Allah, ntitinya inkurikizi z’ibihano Yabahaye.

arabic_text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَغۡشَىٰ
translation: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kw’ijoro iyo ripfutse ibintu vyose kw’isi!

arabic_text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
translation: No ku murango iyo hakeye, hakabona!

arabic_text: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰٓ
translation: No kw’irema ry’igitsina-gabo n’igitsina-gore!

arabic_text: إِنَّ سَعۡيَكُمۡ لَشَتَّىٰ
translation: Bantu! Mu vy’ukuri ibikorwa vyanyu biri kwinshi; muri mwebwe harimwo uwukorera isi, hakabamwo n’uwukorera ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أَعۡطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ
translation: Uwo wese rero azotanga atiziganya mu matungo yiwe ku bw’Imana Allah, akanagamburuka;

arabic_text: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ
translation: Akanemera ijambo “LAA ILAAHA ILLA LLAAH[1]”, ivyo ryigisha, ivyo risaba n’indishi zaryo;
footnotes: [1] Nta mana ibwirijwe gusengwa vy’ukuri atari Imana Imwe Rudende Allah.

arabic_text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡيُسۡرَىٰ
translation: Uyo rero Twebwe Allah, Tuzomworohereza mu buzima bwo kw’isi, Tunamushoboze gukora ivyiza bimushikana mu Bwami bw’ijuru.

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰ
translation: Nayo uwuzoba ingumyi mu gutanga, ntanakenere indishi ku Mana Allah;

arabic_text: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ
translation: Agahakana n’ijambo “LAA ILAAHA ILLA LLAAH”, ivyo ryigisha, ivyo risaba n’indishi zaryo;

arabic_text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡعُسۡرَىٰ
translation: Uyo, Twebwe Allah Tuzomworohereza gukora ibimushikana ku magorwa yo mu muriro udahera;

arabic_text: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
translation: Amatungo yiwe, nta n’ico azomumarira igihe yahanantukiye mu muriro udahera.

arabic_text: إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا لَلۡهُدَىٰ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah, Tujejwe kwerekana inzira igororotse iganisha mu Bwami bw’ijuru.

arabic_text: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلۡأٓخِرَةَ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰ
translation: Kandi mu vy’ukuri, ni Twe Tugaba Tukaganza ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa n’ubwo kw’isi.

arabic_text: فَأَنذَرۡتُكُمۡ نَارٗا تَلَظَّىٰ
translation: Ni na co gituma Ndababuriye - bantu - Ndanabatinyisha n’ibihano vyo mu muriro ururumba.

arabic_text: لَا يَصۡلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى
translation: Nta wuwinjiramwo ubutavayo atari uwimonogoje mu bugarariji;

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
translation: Uwuhakana Umuvugishwamana Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), agaheza akagenza umugongo yirengagiza ukwemera Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo.

arabic_text: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَتۡقَى
translation: Hazokwegezwa kure y’uwo muriro, uwugamburukira Imana Allah bikwiye;

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِي يُؤۡتِي مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
translation: Uwutanga amatungo yiwe ku bw’Imana Allah, arondera kubandanya yiyeza;

arabic_text: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةٖ تُجۡزَىٰٓ
translation: Kandi nta n’umwe agirira ineza mu ntumbero yo gusubirizwa mu ndumane;

arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱبۡتِغَآءَ وَجۡهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ
translation: Ariko agira ineza arondera gushimwa n’Imana yiwe Rurema Allah, Nyenicubahiro-ntangere.

arabic_text: وَلَسَوۡفَ يَرۡضَىٰ
translation: Kandi nta kibuza ko azoshima impera n’inema zayo mu Bwami bw’ijuru.

arabic_text: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ
translation: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku gihe c’umutaga!

arabic_text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
translation: No kw’ijoro iyo ripfutse ibiremwa bigaturura!

arabic_text: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
translation: Ko Imana yawe Rurema Allah Itaguhevye Muvugishwamana; kandi ko Itanagushavuriye ku guteba kw’ihishurirwa rya Qor’ani.

arabic_text: وَلَلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
translation: Nta nkeka rero ko ubuzima bwawe bw’inyuma yo gupfa, ari bwiza kurusha ubwo kw’isi.

arabic_text: وَلَسَوۡفَ يُعۡطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرۡضَىٰٓ
translation: Kandi nta nkeka ko Imana yawe Rurema Allah, Izoguha vyinshi uzoheza ugashima.

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ يَجِدۡكَ يَتِيمٗا فَـَٔاوَىٰ
translation: Muvugishwamana! Mbega, Imana Allah ntiyagusanze uri impfuvyi, Ikakubungabunga!

arabic_text: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلّٗا فَهَدَىٰ
translation: Igusanga utazi ico ari co Igitabu, n’ico ari co ukwemera! Iraheza Irakwigisha ivyo utari uzi, Inagushoboza gukora n'ivyiza bitegetswe!

arabic_text: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلٗا فَأَغۡنَىٰ
translation: Igusanga ukenye maze Iragukenura, Iguha ukwihangana no kubumbwa n’ivyo ufise!

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقۡهَرۡ
translation: Kubera ivyo rero, ntukaryagumbe impfuvyi ngo uyihahaze.

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنۡهَرۡ
translation: Nayo uwusavye gufashwa canke kwigishwa, ntukamuburabuze, ahubwo muhe unamutunganirize;

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا بِنِعۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثۡ
translation: Nayo inema z’Imana yawe Rurema Allah, ziyage ushima.

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ نَشۡرَحۡ لَكَ صَدۡرَكَ
translation: Muvugishwamana! Mbega, Twebwe Allah, ntitwakwaguriye igikiriza cawe mu kuguha ukwihangana, kugira ushobore kwakira ubutumwa no kubushikiriza!

arabic_text: وَوَضَعۡنَا عَنكَ وِزۡرَكَ
translation: Turaheza Tugukurako umutwaro (w’uko abantu bawe warungitsweko batotumbera inzira)!

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهۡرَكَ
translation: Umutwaro wari uremereye umugongo wawe;

arabic_text: وَرَفَعۡنَا لَكَ ذِكۡرَكَ
translation: Gutyo, ku kubera imigenzo myiza wahawe, Tukudugiriza icubahiro.

arabic_text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرًا
translation: Ntuzobuzwe rero n’ibangamirwa ry’abakwanka, gushikiriza ubutumwa. Burya mu vy’ukuri, akaga n’agahengwe biragendana.

arabic_text: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرٗا
translation: Burya mu vy’ukuri, akaga n’agahengwe biragendana.

arabic_text: فَإِذَا فَرَغۡتَ فَٱنصَبۡ
translation: Kubera ivyo rero, iyo uhejeje gutunganya ibikenewe mu vy’isi, senga ushimire Imana Allah;

arabic_text: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرۡغَب
translation: Unatakambe cane urondera ibiri ku Mana yawe Rurema Allah.

arabic_text: وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيۡتُونِ
translation: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kuri “Tiini” na “Zayituuni[1]” (vyahezagiwe)!
footnotes: [1] Tiini na Zayituuni, ni ubwoko bw'ivyamwa.

arabic_text: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
translation: No ku musozi wa Sinayi, ari na ho Intumwa Musa (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah), yavuganiye n’Imana Allah ukuri kwamye!

arabic_text: وَهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ ٱلۡأَمِينِ
translation: No kuri iki gisagara ca Makka gitekanye!

arabic_text: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ
translation: Ni ukuri Twebwe Allah, Twaremye umuntu mw’ishusho ryiza cane;

arabic_text: ثُمَّ رَدَدۡنَٰهُ أَسۡفَلَ سَٰفِلِينَ
translation: Hanyuma Tumusubiza mu muriro udahera, mu gihe atokwumvira Imana Allah agakurikira n’Intumwa zayo.

arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ
translation: Ariko rero abemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa bakanakora n'ivyiza bitegetswe, barategekanirijwe impembo itagabanijwe, idahera.

arabic_text: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعۡدُ بِٱلدِّينِ
translation: Muntu! None ni igiki gituma inyuma y’ivyo vyose, uhakana wivuye inyuma umusi w’impera!

arabic_text: أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحۡكَمِ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ
translation: Mbega burya Imana Allah, Yategekanije umusi wo gutunganiriza ibiremwa, si Yo Nyene kugira ubutungane bubereye ku biremwa vyayo gusumba abacamanza bose! Yobuzwa n’iki! Ego cane, ni Yo!

arabic_text: ٱقۡرَأۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ
translation: Muvugishwamana! Soma ivyo wahishuriwe muri Qor’ani, maze utangure kw’izina ry’Imana yawe Allah Yaremye;

arabic_text: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِنۡ عَلَقٍ
translation: Yaremye zina kiremwa-muntu mu maraso avuze.

arabic_text: ٱقۡرَأۡ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلۡأَكۡرَمُ
translation: Muvugishwamana! Soma ivyo wahishuriwe muri Qor’ani, wizeye ko Imana yawe Rurema Allah ari Yo Mugiraneza-ntangere;

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِٱلۡقَلَمِ
translation: Yigishije ibiremwa kwandika n’ikaramu;

arabic_text: عَلَّمَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مَا لَمۡ يَعۡلَمۡ
translation: Yigishije kiremwa-muntu ivyo kitari kizi, Iraheza Igikura mu muzimagiza w’ubujuju Igishira mu muco w’ubumenyi.

arabic_text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَيَطۡغَىٰٓ
translation: Si ivy’imbeshere ko umuntu yama yarenze ku mabwirizwa y’Imana Allah ku bwishime;

arabic_text: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰٓ
translation: Abitewe n'uko abonye yamaze kwikenura agatunga;

arabic_text: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجۡعَىٰٓ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri uburuhukiro bwiwe, ni ku Mana yawe Rurema Allah, Izomuhembera ivyo yakoze.

arabic_text: أَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي يَنۡهَىٰ
translation: Mbega, warabonye igitangaje kurusha umuntu[1] aburabuza;
footnotes: [1] Ni umuhakanyi yarwanije cane Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), yitwa Abu Jahli.

arabic_text: عَبۡدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ
translation: Umuja[2] w’Imana Allah mu gihe ariko arasenga!
footnotes: [2] Yaburabuje umuja w’Imana Muhamadi gusenga.

arabic_text: أَرَءَيۡتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ
translation: Mbega, ubona gute mu gihe uyo aburabuzwa ugusenga, yoba ari mu nzira igororotse!

arabic_text: أَوۡ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقۡوَىٰٓ
translation: Canke akaba ariko arabwiriza gukora iciza c'igamburukiramana!

arabic_text: أَرَءَيۡتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
translation: Mbega, ubona gute mu gihe uyo aburabuza ugusenga, yoba ahakana ubutumwa, akagenza umugongo yirengagiza ukwemera Allah!

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
translation: Mbega, ntazi neza ko Imana Allah Ibona ivyo akora!

arabic_text: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
translation: Nateshwe ate, arahumba! Ni ukuri, ataretse kurwanya Intumwa, Tuzomufatira mu ruhanga, maze Tumujungunyire mu muriro;

arabic_text: نَاصِيَةٖ كَٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٖ
translation: Uruhanga rw’umubeshi, umunyavyaha;

arabic_text: فَلۡيَدۡعُ نَادِيَهُۥ
translation: Arahamagara rero abateramyi biwe baze bamutabare;

arabic_text: سَنَدۡعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ
translation: Na Twe Allah, Tuzoheza Duhamagare abamalayika b’ibihangange “Al-Zabaaniya”;

arabic_text: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعۡهُ وَٱسۡجُدۡۤ وَٱقۡتَرِب۩
translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Nateshwe ate, arahumba mu kwibaza ko azoguturatuza. Ntukamwumvire ngo ureke gusenga, tsimbatara ku kwubamira Imana Allah, uheze ubandanye uyiyegereze unikundwakaze kuri Yo.

arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةِ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah, Twamanuye Qor’ani mw’ijoro ry’iteka nta ngere mu kwezi kwa Ramadhani.

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co ijoro ry’iteka nta ngere?

arabic_text: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
translation: Ijoro ry’iteka nta ngere, ni ijoro iciza gikozwe muri ryo, gisumba mu ndishi iciza gikozwe mu mezi igihumbi atagiramwo iryo joro[1].
footnotes: [1] Iyo ni impano, Imana Allah Yageneye gusa abantu barungikiwe Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah).

arabic_text: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ
translation: Muri ryo, hamanuka abamalayika ku bwinshi bari kumwe na Mutimamweranda Jibrili, kw’itegeko ry’Imana yabo Rurema Allah, bagaheza bakerekwa n’ivyagezwe vyose vyo muri uwo mwaka.

arabic_text: سَلَٰمٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطۡلَعِ ٱلۡفَجۡرِ
translation: Iryo joro rero, ni amahoro masa gushika umutwenzi ukitse.

arabic_text: لَمۡ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ
translation: Abagararije mu bahawe Igitabu no mu babangikanyamana, ntibari kugera aho bavavanura n’ubugarariji, kugeza bashikiriwe n’icemeza kiboneka;

arabic_text: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ
translation: Ico cemeza, ni Intumwa ivuye ku Mana Allah, yaje ibasomera Qor’ani yanditswe ku mpapuro zitagiramwo agasembwa, zisukuye.

arabic_text: فِيهَا كُتُبٞ قَيِّمَةٞ
translation: Harimwo ibimenyetso n’amategeko atomoye, arongora mu nzira igororotse.

arabic_text: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ
translation: Abahawe Igitabu, ntibiciyemwo imigwi ku vyerekeye ukwemera umuzo w’Intumwa Muhamadi[1], kiretse inyuma y’aho bashikiriwe n’icemeza kiboneka, cemeza ko Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana), ari yo Ntumwa y’Imana Allah basezeraniwe mu Bitabu vyabo.
footnotes: [1] Abahawe Igitabu, bari basanzwe bazi neza ibiranga Intumwa igiye kuza, baranemera ko ari Intumwa y’ukuri bisunze ibiyiranga, ariko iyo Ntumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana) imaze kuza, bariciyemwo imigwi; muri bo hari abayemeye baranayikurikira, hari n’abayihakanye baranayirwanya biturutse kw’ishari n’akarenganyo.

arabic_text: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓاْ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلۡقَيِّمَةِ
translation: Nta n’ikindi bategetswe gukora mu mabwirizwa bahawe, atari ukwiyegereza Imana Allah mu vyo bakora vyose banayisenga ari Imwe Rudende, beze idini ryayo batayibangikanya, batsimbataze n’amasengesho ku mwanya, banatange n’ishikanwa-bwirizwa. Iryo rero, ni ryo dini ry’ukuri, ni na bwo bwislamu.

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ شَرُّ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri, abagararije mu bahawe Igitabu n’ababangikanyamana, bazohanwa mu muriro wa Jahannamu, bazowubamwo ibihe bidahera. Abo rero, ni bo babi cane mu biremwa.

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri, abemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bagakora n’ivyiza bitegetswe; abo rero, ni bo beza cane mu biremwa;

arabic_text: جَزَآؤُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ رَّضِيَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُواْ عَنۡهُۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُۥ
translation: Impembo yabo ku Mana yabo Rurema Allah, ni imirima itotahaye yo mu Bwami bw’ijuru rya “Adeni”, musi y’inyubakwa n’ibiti vyabwo hatemba inzuzi, bazobubamwo ibihe bidahera, mu nema zamaho. Imana Allah Yarabashimiye ku vyo bakoze, na bo nyene barayishimiye ku mpera Yabageneye. Iyo, ni yo mpembo y’uwatinye gucumura ku Mana yiwe Rurema Allah.

arabic_text: إِذَا زُلۡزِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ زِلۡزَالَهَا
translation: Igihe isi yanyiganyijwe nya kunyiganyizwa;

arabic_text: وَأَخۡرَجَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ أَثۡقَالَهَا
translation: Maze isi igasohora ibiri muri yo vyose; abapfuye hamwe n’ubutare;

arabic_text: وَقَالَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا لَهَا
translation: Umuntu akicwa n’ubwoba n’akantu abaza ati: “Mbega yemwe! Isi yashikiwe n’iki?”.

arabic_text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُحَدِّثُ أَخۡبَارَهَا
translation: Uwo musi, isi izoshikiriza inkuru z’ivyayikoreweko vyose; vyaba ivyiza canke ibibi;

arabic_text: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوۡحَىٰ لَهَا
translation: Kuko Imana yawe Rurema Allah Yayitegetse.

arabic_text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
translation: Uwo musi, abantu bazozuka bari imigwimigwi, kugira berekwe n’Imana Allah ibikorwa vyabo, Inabibahembere.

arabic_text: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ
translation: Uwo wese rero akora iciza n’aho coba kingana n’akanyegeri, azobona indishi yaco mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.

arabic_text: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ
translation: N’uwukora ikibi n’aho coba kingana n’akanyegeri, na co nyene azobona igihano caco mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.

arabic_text: وَٱلۡعَٰدِيَٰتِ ضَبۡحٗا
translation: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kw’ifarasi zirukanga zihezuka mu gutera umwansi ku rugamba rwo guharanira Imana Allah!

arabic_text: فَٱلۡمُورِيَٰتِ قَدۡحٗا
translation: N’iziruka ibinono bigacira amasase!

arabic_text: فَٱلۡمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبۡحٗا
translation: N’izitera umwansi mu gitondo!

arabic_text: فَأَثَرۡنَ بِهِۦ نَقۡعٗا
translation: Maze zigasura intumo mu kwiruka!

arabic_text: فَوَسَطۡنَ بِهِۦ جَمۡعًا
translation: Zigana hagati y’abansi!

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٞ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri, umuntu ni intashima y’inema z’Imana yiwe Rurema Allah.

arabic_text: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٞ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri na we nyene kuri ivyo, ni icabona.

arabic_text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri, umuntu mu gukunda amatungo ararengeje.

arabic_text: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ
translation: Mbega umuntu ntazi ibizoba bimurindiriye, igihe Imana Allah Yazuye abapfuye bava mu mva zabo kugira baharurirwe;

arabic_text: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي ٱلصُّدُورِ
translation: Hakanerekanwa n’ibiri mu mishaha (ivyiza canke ibibi)!

arabic_text: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّخَبِيرُۢ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri Imana yabo Rurema, kuri uwo musi, Irazi neza ivyo bakoze, nta na kimwe Iyobewe.

arabic_text: ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ
translation: Umusi nkuramutima.

arabic_text: مَا ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ
translation: Mbega, ni igiki umusi nkuramutima?

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ
translation: Ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co umusi nkuramutima?

arabic_text: يَوۡمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلۡفَرَاشِ ٱلۡمَبۡثُوثِ
translation: Ni umusi, abantu bazozuka batagira iyo baja n’iyo bava, bashwiragiye nk’ibinyugunyugu bishwiragijwe;

arabic_text: وَتَكُونُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَٱلۡعِهۡنِ ٱلۡمَنفُوشِ
translation: N’imisozi ikaba nk’ubwoya bw’isufi[1] busanzajwe, butumuriwe hejuru n’umuyaga.
footnotes: [1] Isufi, ni ubwoya bw'intama canke ubw’agakwavu.

arabic_text: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
translation: Uwo wese rero, ivyiza vyiwe bizoremera ku munzani;

arabic_text: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٖ رَّاضِيَةٖ
translation: Uyo, ni we azoba mu buzima bushimishije mu Bwami bw’ijuru.

arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَفَّتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
translation: Nayo uwo ivyiza vyiwe bizohwahuka ku munzani;

arabic_text: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٞ
translation: Uyo rero, uburuhukiro bwiwe ni mu manga ihonya.

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا هِيَهۡ
translation: Mbega none, ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co imanga ihonya?

arabic_text: نَارٌ حَامِيَةُۢ
translation: Ni umuriro udahera, ururumba.

arabic_text: أَلۡهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ
translation: Mwasamajwe n'ukwihaya ku bwinshi bw’amatungo n’ibibondo, muraheza mureka kugamburukira Imana Allah!

arabic_text: حَتَّىٰ زُرۡتُمُ ٱلۡمَقَابِرَ
translation: Mugashishikara gusamazwa n’ivyo, gushika n’aho mushengereye mugahambwa mu mva.

arabic_text: كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ
translation: Nimuteshwe mute, murahumba! Ivyo ntibikwiye kubasamaza namba! Nimwikebuke, ubu vuba bwango muzomenya ko ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa ari bwo bwiza kuri mwebwe.

arabic_text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ
translation: Eka nimuteshwe mute, murahumba! Nimwikebuke, ubu vuba bwango muzomenya inkurikizi mbi z’ukutumvira Imana Allah.

arabic_text: كَلَّا لَوۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ عِلۡمَ ٱلۡيَقِينِ
translation: Eka nimuteshwe mute! Iyo mumenya vy’ukuri ibibafitiye akamaro, mworetse kwihaya ku vy’isi, mukihutira nyabuna gukora ivyiza.

arabic_text: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلۡجَحِيمَ
translation: Ni ukuri muzobona umuriro ururumba.

arabic_text: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيۡنَ ٱلۡيَقِينِ
translation: Kandi ni ukuri, muzowubona ukuri kwamye.

arabic_text: ثُمَّ لَتُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
translation: Hanyuma, ni ukuri kuri uwo musi w’impera, muzobazwa ku nema z’ubwoko bwose ico mwazikoresheje.

arabic_text: وَٱلۡعَصۡرِ
translation: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku gihe, kubera ibitangaza birimwo vyerekana ubushobozi bwanje!

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَفِي خُسۡرٍ
translation: Ko mu vy’ukuri, zina kiremwa-muntu kiri mu ruhombo;

arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ
translation: Kiretse abemeye Imana Allah bagakora n'ivyiza bitegetswe, bagahanurana no kwama bashigikiye bagendera ukuri, bakanahanurana kwihangana muri ivyo vyose.

arabic_text: وَيۡلٞ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٖ لُّمَزَةٍ
translation: Uguhanwa nya guhanwa, ni ukw’uwo wese anegura akandagaza abantu, akwiragiza insaku (gateranya);

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالٗا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ
translation: Yishinga kwegeranya amatungo no kuyaharura kenshi.

arabic_text: يَحۡسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخۡلَدَهُۥ
translation: Mbega yibaza ko amatungo yiwe azomubeshaho ibihe bidahera akanamukingira iharurirwa!

arabic_text: كَلَّاۖ لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِي ٱلۡحُطَمَةِ
translation: Nateshwe ate, arahumba! Ni ukuri uyo muntu, azojugunywa muri ruyonza.

arabic_text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡحُطَمَةُ
translation: Ntumwa y'Imana! Mbega, ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co ruyonza?

arabic_text: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمُوقَدَةُ
translation: Ni umuriro w’Imana Allah wama wegenyejwe;

arabic_text: ٱلَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةِ
translation: Unyengetera mu mishaha.

arabic_text: إِنَّهَا عَلَيۡهِم مُّؤۡصَدَةٞ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri, uwo muriro urabakikuje mu mpande zose;

arabic_text: فِي عَمَدٖ مُّمَدَّدَةِۭ
translation: Bazoba baboheshejwe iminyororo miremire n’amapingu; ntibazocaruka na gato.

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡفِيلِ
translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Mbega, ntiwamenye ingene Imana yawe Rurema Allah Yagize beninzovu[1]!
footnotes: [1] Abraha Al-Habashiy, umutware wo muri Etiyopiya n’ingabo ziwe, igihe bashaka gusenyura Al-Ka’ba.

arabic_text: أَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡ كَيۡدَهُمۡ فِي تَضۡلِيلٖ
translation: Umugambi wabo mubi, ntiyawugize impfagusa ukaburizwamwo!

arabic_text: وَأَرۡسَلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ طَيۡرًا أَبَابِيلَ
translation: Iraheza Ibarungikira inyoni ziri mu migwimigwi;

arabic_text: تَرۡمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٖ مِّن سِجِّيلٖ
translation: Zibatera amabuye yokeje, ziraheza zirabahonya.

arabic_text: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ كَعَصۡفٖ مَّأۡكُولِۭ
translation: Maze Ibagira nk’ivyatsi vyarishijwe n'intungwa hanyuma iravyuza, iraheza ibita ari amahenehene.

arabic_text: لِإِيلَٰفِ قُرَيۡشٍ
translation: Kubera akamenyero k’Abakorayishi;

arabic_text: إِۦلَٰفِهِمۡ رِحۡلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيۡفِ
translation: Akamenyero kabo ko kuja mu gihugu ca Yemeni kiri mu bumanuko mu rushana, no kuja mu bihugu vyo muri Shaamu biri mu buraruko mu ci, aho baja kurangura ibidandazwa, bakishira bakizana ata nkomanzi.

arabic_text: فَلۡيَعۡبُدُواْ رَبَّ هَٰذَا ٱلۡبَيۡتِ
translation: Kubera ivyo rero, nibashimire Imana Rurema Nyene iyi ngoro ntagatifu (Al-Ka’ba), babaye hambavu yayo batekaniwe; baheze bayiyegereze mu vyo bakora vyose banayisenge ari Imwe Rudende;

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ
translation: Yo Yabafunguriye Ikabakiza inzara, Ikabaha n’umutekano, Ikanabakiza ubwoba.

arabic_text: أَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ
translation: Mbega warabonye uwuhakana yivuye inyuma, izuka ry’ibiremwa n’impera yavyo ku musi w’izuka?

arabic_text: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِي يَدُعُّ ٱلۡيَتِيمَ
translation: Uyo, ni uwuryagumba agahahaza impfuvyi, agahonyanga agateka kayo ku karenganyo;

arabic_text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينِ
translation: Ntanahimirize gufungurira abakene, nkeswe kubafungurira we nyene.

arabic_text: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلۡمُصَلِّينَ
translation: Burya guhanwa nya guhanwa, ni ukw’abasenga mu buryarya;

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَن صَلَاتِهِمۡ سَاهُونَ
translation: Abirengagiza amasengesho yabo mu kutayasengera ku mwanya wayo no mu kutubahiriza ibisabwa vyayo;

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ يُرَآءُونَ
translation: Abiyerekana mu vyo bakora kugira bashimwe n’abantu;

arabic_text: وَيَمۡنَعُونَ ٱلۡمَاعُونَ
translation: Bakanimana mu kudatizanya utumaramuziro[1].
footnotes: [1] Bananiwe kuba abagwaneza mu gusenga Imana Allah, bananirwa no kuba abagwaneza ku biremwa.

arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَعۡطَيۡنَٰكَ ٱلۡكَوۡثَرَ
translation: Muvugishwamana! Mu vy’ukuri, Twarakweguriye impano y’ivyiza vyinshi nta ngere kw’isi no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa[1].
footnotes: [1] Muri ivyo vyiza, ni uruzi “Kawthar” ruri mu Bwami bw’ijuru, ku nkengera zarwo hari amahema yubatswe mu butare bw’agaciro “lulu”, umusenyi wo muri rwo, ni “miski”.

arabic_text: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنۡحَرۡ
translation: Kubera ivyo rero, senga wamizeko wongere ukerere kw’izina ry’Imana no ku bw’Imana yawe Rurema Allah.

arabic_text: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلۡأَبۡتَرُ
translation: Mu vy’ukuri, uwugucokora akanka n’uburongozi warungikanwe, ni we yacitswe n’ivyiza vyose, kw’isi no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.

arabic_text: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ
translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga uti: “Emwe bagarariji!

arabic_text: لَآ أَعۡبُدُ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ
translation: Jewe sinzosenga ivyo musenga (ibigirwamana).

arabic_text: وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعۡبُدُ
translation: Na mwe ntimusenga Imana Imwe Rudende nsenga.

arabic_text: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدٞ مَّا عَبَدتُّمۡ
translation: Eka nanje sinsenga uko mwebwe musenga.

arabic_text: وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعۡبُدُ
translation: Kandi na mwe ntimuzosenga Imana Imwe Rudende Allah[1] nsenga.
footnotes: [1] Iyi Aayah, yahishuwe ku nkuru ya bamwe mu bagarariji bazwi ku mazina, Imana Allah Yari Izi ko batazopfa bemeye Imana Imwe Rudende Allah.

arabic_text: لَكُمۡ دِينُكُمۡ وَلِيَ دِينِ
translation: Mufise idini ryanyu rero, nanje nkagira idini ryanje ntarota mpindura”.

arabic_text: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصۡرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡفَتۡحُ
translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Igihe habonetse intsinzi y’Imana Allah ugatsinda ababangikanyamana mu Bakorayishi, ugaheza ugahabuza igisagara ca Makka;

arabic_text: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا
translation: Ukabona n’abantu binjira mw’idini ry’Imana Allah ry’ubwislamu ari benshi mu migwimigwi;

arabic_text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا
translation: Aho rero, uraca witegurira kurengutswa n’Imana Allah, uheze uninahaze ushimagize Imana yawe Rurema Allah, wongere uyisabe kenshi ikigongwe. Mu vy’ukuri, Yo Yamye Yumvira cane abigaya.

arabic_text: تَبَّتۡ يَدَآ أَبِي لَهَبٖ وَتَبَّ
translation: Yarahonye Abu Lahabi, aragahona ku kubera ukubangamira kwiwe Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah).

arabic_text: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
translation: Amatungo yiwe, eka n’abana biwe, nta co bizomumarira ngo bimukingire ibihano vy’Imana Allah.

arabic_text: سَيَصۡلَىٰ نَارٗا ذَاتَ لَهَبٖ
translation: Azokwinjira mu muriro ururumba cane, maze awote;

arabic_text: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلۡحَطَبِ
translation: Ari kumwe n’umugore wiwe (Ummu Jamiila), yahora yikorera amahwa akayatega mu nzira Intumwa y’Imana (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah) icamwo;

arabic_text: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبۡلٞ مِّن مَّسَدِۭ
translation: Uyo mukenyezi, azotabwa mu muriro aboheshejwe mw’izosi ikiziriko gitsivye neza.

arabic_text: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga uti: “Imana Allah, ni Imwe Rudende mu bumana bwayo, mu bushobozi bwo kurema no mu mazina n’amatazirano yayo.

arabic_text: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ
translation: Imana Allah, ni Yo Nyenugutumberwa muri vyose.

arabic_text: لَمۡ يَلِدۡ وَلَمۡ يُولَدۡ
translation: Ntiyavyaye kandi ntiyavyawe, eka ntigira n’umugore.

arabic_text: وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدُۢ
translation: Kandi ntigira ikiremwa na kimwe bisa canke bisusa, haba mu mazina n’amatazirano yayo, haba no mu bushobozi bwayo”.

arabic_text: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡفَلَقِ
translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga uti: “Ndikinze ku Mana Allah, Umuremyi w’igitondo;

arabic_text: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
translation: Inkingire inabi y’ivyo Yaremye vyose;

arabic_text: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
translation: N’inabi y’ijoro iyo ryijimye;

arabic_text: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِي ٱلۡعُقَدِ
translation: N’inabi y’abarozikazi bahuha mu mapfundo mu kuroga;

arabic_text: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
translation: N’inabi y’umunyeshari[1] iyo asharitse”.
footnotes: [1] Umunyeshari, ni umuntu asharika abandi abahora impano bahawe n’Imana Allah, akipfuza ko nya mpano zohona, akanababangamira mu buzima.

arabic_text: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ
translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga uti: “Ndikinze ku Mubungabunzi w’abantu bose;

arabic_text: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ
translation: Umwami Mugabe w’abantu, Yikenuye;

arabic_text: إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ
translation: Imana Nyene gusengwa n’abantu, ata yindi mana ikwiye gusengwa atari Yo;

arabic_text: مِن شَرِّ ٱلۡوَسۡوَاسِ ٱلۡخَنَّاسِ
translation: Inkingire inabi ya shetani itera amazinda kenshi iyo umuntu agoswe, ikanyegera iyo aninahaje Imana Allah;

arabic_text: ٱلَّذِي يُوَسۡوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ
translation: Itera amazinda n’amakenga mu mitima y’abantu, ikabosha gukora ibibi no kureka ibitegetswe;

arabic_text: مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ
translation: Ikomoka mu bwoko bw’Amajini n’ubw’abantu”.
